about_the_game:
When we set out to create Jumplight Odyssey the game, we knew the music needed to be special and that it was going to carry a lot of emotional weight. The music was never an after thought for us, we knew it was going to set the emotional stage for the events that would unfold as you commanded your crew and starship through a dangerous galaxy.

Jumplight Odyssey’s “retro 1970’s futurist anime universe”, gave us a chance to really flex our creative muscle, musically. We experimented with an entirely new genre of music, and ended up with something that aptly feels like it's pulled directly out of a 1970’s midnight Tokyo disco or a smoky Japanese jazz bar.

We hope this magical OST takes you on many romantic intergalactic voyages, full of tragedy, happiness, love, loss and hopefulness.

Original Music by Michael Allen
Produced, Mixed and Mastered by Michael Allen
Cover Art by Ty Carey, Adam Duncan, Willow Buckley

Michael Allen has gone from chart-surfing pop songs to moving soundtracks for the screen, having composed for award winning videogames The Forgotten City, Solium Infernum and Armello, among many others.

Jumplight Odyssey (Original Game Soundtrack) Total Length: 1:19:42
